mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( company_id, email, login_id, login_pwd, name_kr, name_en, department, position, role_desc, phone_number, role_in_company, is_verified, auth_provider, created_at ) VALUES ( #{companyId}, #{email}, #{loginId}, #{loginPwd}, #{nameKr}, #{nameEn}, #{department}, #{position}, #{roleDesc}, #{phoneNumber}, #{roleInCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVerified}, #{authProvider}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber})

SELECT u.name_kr AS nameKr, u.name_en AS nameEn, u.email AS email, u.login_id AS loginId, u.department AS department, u.position AS position, u.role_desc AS roleDesc, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber, c.company_name_kr AS companyNameKr FROM users u JOIN companies c ON u.company_id = c.company_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
